Title: Expands the definition of crops, livestock and livestock products
Summary: Expands the definition of crops, livestock and livestock products to include purpose-bred animals raised for research, service animals, working dogs or any working animals in service on a farm.
LawCode: Amd ยง301, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to expanding the definition of crops, livestock and livestock products
